body.name: White Ceramic Decorative Vases, Set of 2, Nordic, Modern, Minimalist Design, for Home Decor, Bedroom, Weddings, Restaurants, Office and More
features: VERSATILE: Can be used for not only home decor but also in weddings, parties, restaurants and offices.
GREAT GIFT IDEA: These vases make the perfect gift for weddings, housewarming parties, or any other special occasion.
ELEGANT DESIGN: The aesthetic, modern, boho-style design of the vases add an element of elegance and luxury to any room.
EASY TO MATCH: Our vases are designed to complement a wide range of decor styles, making them an easy match for your existing furniture and accessories.
QUALITY: Crafted from high-quality ceramic, our vases are smooth to the touch, durable and built to last.
body.description: Introducing our elegant set of decorative vases, the perfect addition to your home decor. Crafted from high-quality ceramic, each vase features a modern and stylish design that will add a touch of sophistication to any room. The set includes two vases in large and small size, allowing you to create an eye-catching display on a shelf, mantle, or table. Each vase is handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring that each piece is unique and of the highest quality. The sleek and versatile design of these vases allows them to be used for a wide range of purposes, from holding flowers to storing decorative items or functioning as standalone pieces of art. Size Small: 9 inches x 4.5 inches Size Large: 13.5 inches x 5.5 inches Color: White and Gold Material: Ceramic Set: Comes as a 2-piece set (1 large and 1 small) Packaging size: 15 x 6.5 x 5.3 inches Packaging weight: 2.53 lbs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely delighted with the set of 2 white ceramic decorative vases that I recently purchased. These vases have truly transformed the ambiance of my bedroom, adding an exquisite touch of sophistication that I couldn't be happier with.From the moment I unpacked them, I was captivated by their sleek and minimalist design. The Nordic and modern aesthetic is precisely what I was looking for to elevate the overall decor of my bedroom. The vases exude an air of elegance and simplicity that perfectly aligns with my personal style.The quality of the ceramic is exceptional. The smooth, pristine surface of the vases showcases a flawless white hue that effortlessly complements any color scheme. The attention to detail is evident in every curve and contour, reflecting the mastery of craftsmanship that went into creating these pieces.What truly sets these vases apart is their versatility. I've placed them on my bedside table, and they have become the focal point of the room. Their understated beauty draws the eye without overwhelming the space, creating a serene and inviting atmosphere. Whether I want to display a single stem or a small bouquet, these vases provide the perfect canvas to showcase nature's beauty.The impact of these vases extends beyond their aesthetic appeal. They've injected a renewed sense of energy into my bedroom, making it a space where I find solace and inspiration. I've received numerous compliments from friends and family who have been equally captivated by their charm.From a practical perspective, the vases are easy to clean and maintain, which is a bonus for someone with a busy schedule like mine. Their sturdy build and stable base provide confidence that they will remain in pristine condition for years to come.

reviews.reviewText: Excellent vase, gifted it to my mom and she loves it! The size is perfect for a table or shelf, the color dynamic is very appealing. One of the best home decorating pieces you can find.
